Class OCPPTransportTemplate<T extends OCPPCommand, H extends OCPPHandler>

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
io.u2ware.ocpp.OCPPTransportTemplate<T,H>
All Implemented Interfaces:
OCPPTransport<T,H>, org.springframework.messaging.simp.stomp.StompFrameHandler, org.springframework.messaging.simp.stomp.StompSessionHandler, org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
CentralSystemTransport, ChargePointTransport, ChargingStationTransport, ChargingStationTransport, CSMSTransport, CSMSTransport
public abstract class OCPPTransportTemplate<T extends OCPPCommand, H extends OCPPHandler> extends org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler implements org.springframework.messaging.simp.stomp.StompSessionHandler, OCPPTransport<T,H>
